text: Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
Motion
So, it's Deneb... and then, um...

Too bad, time's up, Deneb was the correct answer.
The remaining ones are...

Al... Aluminum foil...!
Something like that... Feeling!
...What about this photo...

Yes!
It's Choco-senpai surprising Rinze.
And what about this one...?

Oh! That's... I also surprised Rinze
and accidentally captured the ceiling...

Hehe... Rinze...
isn't... a ghost...

...I, yesterday, before going to bed, and in the morning
when I woke up, I kept looking at them over and over again.

Yesterday... I felt reluctant for the day to end...
And this morning, I realized it's already the second day...

And then... I started feeling really lonely...
Um... what's this feeling?

...U-Um, Rinze-san, what should we do!
I... I don't want to go home...!

After seeing the photos... I understand...
why Kaho-san was entrusted with the camera...
It feels like... I can relate...
HO-KA-GO CLIMAX GIRLS are...

For Rinze... they're her closest friends...
Competition, but also companions...

After looking at Kaho-san's photos...
I was able to... feel that way again...

Just a bit more... but...
We can still take more, right...?

Rinze-san...
Yes...!

Hehe...
May the final day... be a good one...
